pullrequest.title: Fix linking of opende with HAVE_BULLET

content.raw:
I’m currently building on Windows using msbuild. My dependencies are coming from vcpkg, however with Bullet I needed to make some other changes to get Gazebo’s build to find it at all \(not included here since that’s still a WIP\). On Windows, currently Bullet requires static linking although there is a [PR ](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/pull/2389)to produce a DLL.

I found that the generated build system files were not attempting to link against Bullet at all, which explains the error below, and is why I made the changes in this PR.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/664594237-image.png)
‌

On Windows, currently Bullet requires static linking although there is a PR to produce a DLL.

I found that the generated build system files were not attempting to link against Bullet at all, which explains the error below, and is why I made the changes in this PR.
